# MenuViewModel.IsEnabled property

Whether the menu is enabled. True by default.

```csharp
public bool IsEnabled { get; set; }
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| NotSupportedException | Passed `false` value for a top-level menu. |
